final_extraction_start: ^Hübris: "this is it. final extraction. one shot."
^Roo: "we all are. but we're doing it anyway."
^The plan is locked. AiSatoshi crosses the border in 48 hours. Everything depends on the route you choose.
commercial_route: ^Hübris: "commercial flight. blend in with business travelers."
^Stack: "high risk. TSA, passport control, cameras everywhere."
^Roo: "but it's the most normal route. nobody expects bold moves."

commercial_route.#: chat: EvilFear: got him a fresh passport. looks legit.

commercial_route: ^You book the flight. Singapore Airlines, SFO arrival. Clean legend, consulting gig cover story.
^But 6 hours before departure, Stack spots something.
^Stack: "wait wait wait. someone's flagging his documents."
^Stack: "can't tell. but there's a customs alert on his passport number."

commercial_route.#: terminal: ALERT: Passport flagged in system

commercial_route: ^Burn the documents, rebook under new identity
^Push through anyway, hope it's a false positive
^Abort commercial route, pivot to overland FAST
commercial_pivot: ^Roo: "new identity. now. Stack, you have a backup?"
^Stack: "yeah but it's not as clean. might trigger secondary screening."
^Hübris: "better than a black bag at SFO."

commercial_pivot.#: terminal: New identity purchased. Documents updated.

commercial_pivot: ^You burn the compromised passport. New identity: Michael Chen, enterprise software consultant.
^The flight boards. AiSatoshi walks through security. Laptop, carry-on, nothing flagged.
^He lands at SFO. Immigration officer barely looks up.

commercial_pivot.#: chat: Roo: he's through. holy shit he's through.

commercial_risky: ^Hübris: "it's probably a database error. push through."
^AiSatoshi boards the flight. It's smooth until immigration.

commercial_risky.#: chat: Stack: oh fuck oh fuck oh fuck

commercial_risky: ^The interview room. Two officers. They ask about his work, his connections, his funding sources.
^He sticks to the cover story. Consulting. Freelance. Boring work.
^After 40 minutes, they let him go. But it was close.

commercial_risky.#: chat: Hübris: that was too fucking close

private_route: ^Stack: "expensive. and if we get caught it looks REALLY bad."
^Roo: "but no TSA. no passport control. clean exit."
^You arrange the charter through a contact. Small jet, airfield 90 minutes outside the city.
^The pilot asks no questions. Cash payment. Wheels up at 0400.
^But during the flight, Stack catches chatter on secure channels.
^Stack: "guys. someone's tracking private air traffic out of the region."

private_route.#: terminal: ALERT: Unusual air traffic surveillance detected

private_route: ^Land at planned airport, hope we're not flagged
^Have pilot file false flight plan, land somewhere else
private_normal: ^Roo: "we stick to the plan. changing now draws more attention."

private_normal.#: terminal: Landing at San Jose private terminal

private_normal: ^The jet lands. AiSatoshi walks through the private terminal. No screening. No questions.
^He's in a rideshare 15 minutes later. Clean.

private_normal.#: chat: Hübris: easiest extraction of my life

private_divert.#: terminal: Flight diverted to alternate location

private_divert: ^You land at a smaller airfield. Less surveillance. Less risk.
^AiSatoshi clears the terminal. No issues. No flags.

private_divert.#: chat: Stack: clean landing. he's out.

overland_route: ^Stack: "high risk. border agents are trained to spot runners."
^Roo: "but if we nail the timing, it's clean."

overland_route.#: terminal: Route selected: Overland border crossing

overland_route: ^You coordinate with contacts. Border checkpoint. Rush hour traffic. Blend in.
^AiSatoshi drives a rental car. Documents ready. Cover story: visiting family in Bay Area.
^But at the checkpoint, something goes wrong.
^Distraction: staged accident behind you in line
overland_clean: ^AiSatoshi opens the trunk. Luggage. Laptop bag. Nothing suspicious.

overland_clean.#: chat: Roo: he's through. clean as hell.

overland_escalate: ^AiSatoshi: "I'd prefer not to. Am I being detained?"
^Eventually they let him through, but it's messy. His face is on camera. Reports filed.

overland_escalate.#: chat: Hübris: that was NOT clean

overland_distraction: ^Two cars behind AiSatoshi, a staged fender-bender. Shouting. Chaos.
^All the agents turn to handle the scene. AiSatoshi gets waved through.

emergency_pivot.#: terminal: Emergency pivot to overland route

emergency_pivot: ^You scramble. New documents. New vehicle. New timeline.
^It's rushed. It's messy. But AiSatoshi makes it across.

emergency_pivot.#: chat: Stack: i can't believe that worked

private_deception: ^Roo: "file a false flight plan. make them think we're landing in LA."
^The pilot files for LAX. But you land in San Jose. Clean misdirection.

private_deception.#: chat: Stack: they're tracking the wrong plane

extraction_success: ^Roo: "kept the stack alive. got the man out."
^AiSatoshi lands in Silicon Valley. Clean identity. Clean trail. Ready to build.
extraction_partial: ^Roo: "we'll deal with it. he's in. that's what matters."
^AiSatoshi makes it to Silicon Valley. But there are traces. Flags. Attention.
